author: aston m

review: I bought the Roku a couple of years ago and loved it.  I bough the Apple TV because I really wanted to be able to mirror my apple products in my house. so we moved the Roku to the basement for the kids and have the Apple TV in the main living room.I like that I am able to sync everything up. and it was easy too.  I wish that I was still able to access all the different channels like you can on Roku - like TEDtv. on the flip side, I like that you can view YouTube easily on this device. so there are pros and cons.Overall, I like the Roku and AppleTV equally, they just each have their own benefits.  both stream well and rarely ever an issue.

review: We order this because our kids have it and love it. Nowhere did it say that we couldn't use it without an HD tv. I realize most people have updated their tv, but as ours still work, we haven't wanted to spend the money yet, so it wouldn't work. I hope, sometime to update and then would love to have an Apple TV, but also think Apple needs to be clear about what tv they WILL work with in the future!
author: Myra Moritz

review: After getting this and using it for a few months it became very apparent to me that I could finally cut the satellite. One thing I would recommend is either having an iphone or an ipad.  With either of those devices you can Airplay them on to your TV and watch pretty much any network TV show you want.  The other feature I love that I didn't expect was that all the music and movies you have in iTunes is available to play on the device.  I love this thing!
